name: Find her (Satoshi Waku)
description:
FIND HER

Your love has disapeared , find her before it's too late. You enter a maze with rooms, each room has doors, but beware because they are trap doors and door that don't end up somewhere.

Simple game, simple premise. Move with WASD and use J and K for "something else"

Each level is different if you restart the game, so each level is different.
**Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3
